tiled.core
Class AnimatedTile

java.lang.Object
  tiled.core.Tile
      tiled.core.AnimatedTile

public class AnimatedTile
extends Tile

Animated tiles take advantage of the Sprite class internally to handle animation using an array of tiles.

See Also:
Sprite

getScaledImage

public java.awt.Image getScaledImage(double zoom)
In an AnimatedTile we must take the extra step of zooming all frames of the animation. This function can be somewhat slower than calling getScaledImage() on a Tile, but it depends on several factors.

Overrides:
getScaledImage in class Tile
Parameters:
zoom - the requested zoom level
Returns:
Image
See Also:
Tile.getScaledImage(double)
